Class CsvUserRepository

java.lang.Object
CsvUserRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserRepository
public class CsvUserRepository extends Object implements IUserRepository
CSV-based repository implementation for managing users. Loads and saves user data from/to CSV files for students, staff, and company representatives.
